name: The Barbarians
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Your puny nation must be removed from the face of earth. Prepare yourself men, for we are marching on to battle!
attacked: Oh, what's this? You're asking me to add your riches to my collection? Hahaha, with pleasure...
defeated: This will not be the end of us barbarians. My men are scattered throughout the world, and there is nothing you can do to stop us.
introduction: I am Braslaur, chieftain of the barbarians. Now you might notice that there are people that attack and pillage one your cities. I can assure you that they are just from another tribe, though we might attack you if we feel like it.
hateHello: You dare show your face here?!
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: When conquering an encampment, earn [16] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [80]% chance>
